job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
**Immediate Requirement for our Direct Client**
Job Title : SRE/OPs
Location : Remote
Duration :12 Months
Skills Looking at:
Needs to be familiar with the following technologies:  Linux, SSH, Kubernetes, Jira, Bash, curl, docker, Jenkins, Network Stack.
Skills that would be a plus: Java, Go, Scala or the ability to pick up new programming languages.
Please share resumes to shaikm@aditiconsulting.com.
